data.title: Western Philosophy
data.meta_description: rb60.docx - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Ray Brassier is a professor of philosophy at the American University of Beirut. He received his PhD from the University of Warwick in 2001. His areas of specialization include 19th and 20th century European philosophy, philosophy of mind, philosophy of science, and metaphysics. He has authored one book, Nihil Unbound: Enlightenment and Extinction, as well as edited several others and published over 20 journal articles and book chapters.
